The Sayings of the Prophet Muhammad: The Sayings of the Prophet Muhammad
Ad-free experience and exclusive content: Ad-free experience and exclusive content for you.
Rotate your phone until the mosque icon: Rotate your phone until the mosque icon aligns with the top of the compass.
Stand facing the Qiblah. Make the intent: Stand facing the Qiblah. Make the intention in your heart to perform the specific prayer.
Raise your hands to your ears and say \": Raise your hands to your ears and say "Allahu Akbar" (God is the Greatest). Lower your hands and place right hand over left on chest.
Stand with respect. Recite Surah Al-Fati: Stand with respect. Recite Surah Al-Fatiha and another short Surah/verses from the Quran.
Say \"Allahu Akbar\" and bow down used h: Say "Allahu Akbar" and bow down used hands on knees. Keep back straight. Say "Subhana Rabbiyal Azeem" 3 times.
Rise back to standing saying \"Sami Alla: Rise back to standing saying "Sami Allahu Liman Hamidah". Then say "Rabbana Lakal Hamd".
Go down to the floor saying \"Allahu Akb: Go down to the floor saying "Allahu Akbar". Forehead, nose, palms, knees, and toes should touch the ground. Say "Subhana Rabbiyal A/la" 3 times.
Say \"Ashhadu An La Ilaha Illa Allah\" a: Say "Ashhadu An La Ilaha Illa Allah" and "Ashhadu An Nabi Muhammadur Rasulullah".
Turn your head to the right saying \"Ass: Turn your head to the right saying "Assalamu Alaikum wa Rahmatullah", then to the left.
Make the intention in your heart to perf: Make the intention in your heart to perform Wudu for the sake of Allah, then say "Bismillah" (In the name of Allah).
Wash your hands up to the wrists three t: Wash your hands up to the wrists three times, ensuring water reaches between the fingers.
Rinse your mouth with water three times,: Rinse your mouth with water three times, swirling it around to ensure it reaches all parts.
Sniff clean water into your nose and the: Sniff clean water into your nose and then blow it out, three times.
Wash your entire face three times, from: Wash your entire face three times, from the hairline to the chin and from ear to ear.
Wash your arms up to and including the e: Wash your arms up to and including the elbows three times, starting with the right arm then the left.
Wipe your head with wet hands, starting: Wipe your head with wet hands, starting from the forehead to the back of the neck and back to the forehead once.
Wipe the inside of your ears with your i: Wipe the inside of your ears with your index fingers and the back of your ears with your thumbs once.
Wash your feet up to and including the a: Wash your feet up to and including the ankles three times, starting with the right foot then the left. Ensure water reaches between toes.
